content.raw_text: From: Hulu Accounts welcome@hulu.com To: lars.johansson72@example.se Date: Tue, 22 Aug 2023 14:18:02 +0200 Subject: Welcome to Hulu, Lars! Let’s get you started 🎉 Hi Lars, Welcome aboard — we’re thrilled to have you join the Hulu family! We know there are countless ways to spend your free time, and we’re honored you chose us. Whether it's binge-watching family favorites, diving into gripping Hulu Originals, or catching your local news from the comfort of your couch, your streaming adventure starts right here. Your account is all set up and ready to go. Once you’re in, here are a few ways to make the most of Hulu right away: Set up your profile. Create your personal profile and avatar, so every member of your household gets their own curated recommendations. Start saving. Add shows and movies to your Watchlist so you can get back to them anytime — even on the go. Explore new originals. Whether you’re in the mood for the tense drama of The Handmaid’s Tale, the laughs from Only Murders in the Building, or something fresh, we’ve got you covered. What Happens Next Over the coming week, you’ll receive a few helpful tips and personalized content drops — all designed to enhance your experience: Friday, 25 Aug 2023: A personalized recommendations email tailored just for you based on what you watch. Monday, 28 Aug 2023: A guide to using voice search and setting up profiles on your TV. Thursday, 31 Aug 2023: A sneak peek at upcoming Hulu Originals you won’t want to miss. We respect your inbox, so only the essentials and the stuff you’ll love. You’re in complete control — you can tweak your email preferences anytime in your account settings. If you ever run into questions or just want to share your thoughts, our support team is here 24/7. Feel free to reach out at care@hulu.com — we’re always happy to help! Happy Streaming, The Hulu Onboarding Team

From: Hulu Billing billing@hulu.com To: sofia.martinelli94@example.it Date: Thu, 05 Oct 2023 09:45:27 +0200 Subject: Your Hulu payment is confirmed, Sofia 🎉 Hi Sofia, Thanks for being part of our community! Your payment has been successfully processed, and we’re excited to continue bringing you the shows, movies, and live programming you love. Let’s take a look at the details: Description: Payment Summary Plan: Hulu (No Ads) Monthly Amount Charged: €11.99 Transaction Date: Thursday, 05 October 2023 Next Billing Date: Friday, 05 November 2023 Payment Method: Visa ending in •••• 1234 Transaction ID: HULU‑TXN‑7896543210 Your account access remains uninterrupted — from The Handmaid’s Tale to tomorrow’s big game, everything’s ready whenever and wherever you are. And if you’d like to tweak your plan, switch payment information, or explore add-ons like Live TV or Premium Networks, simply visit your account settings via the button below: [ 🔒 Manage Your Account ] Happy streaming, The Hulu Billing Team Hulu, LLC 625 Madison Avenue, 22nd Floor • New York, NY 10022 © 2023 Hulu, LLC. All rights reserved. You received this email because you have an active Hulu subscription for sofia.martinelli94@example.it. You can [update your preferences] or [unsubscribe] — though we’ll only send essential billing info unless you opt in for more.

From: Hulu Billing billing@hulu.com To: jan.kowalski53@example.pl Date: Wed, 13 Sep 2023 11:17:54 +0200 Subject: Trouble with Your Hulu Payment, Jan Hi Jan, We attempted to process your recent Hulu payment, but it didn’t go through. This can happen if your card expired, your bank blocked the charge, or the billing info needs an update. Here’s what we tried: Plan: Hulu (No Ads) Monthly Amount: 56,99 PLN Attempted On: Tuesday, 12 September 2023 Payment Method: Mastercard ending in •••• 5678 Ref ID: HULU‑FAIL‑20230912‑PL Your account is paused for now, but we’ve given you 48 hours to update your payment method before any interruption. It only takes a minute: [ 💳 Update Payment Info ] Once your info is updated, we’ll process the charge again automatically. You’ll get a confirmation email as soon as it goes through. If you didn’t try to make this payment or have questions, reply to this email or contact us at billing@hulu.com — we’re here 24/7. Thanks for choosing Hulu. We’ll keep your watchlist warm! – The Hulu Billing Team Hulu, LLC 625 Madison Avenue, 22nd Floor • New York, NY 10022 © 2023 Hulu, LLC. All rights reserved. This message was sent to jan.kowalski53@example.pl.

From: Hulu Billing billing@hulu.com To: ines.muller29@example.de Date: Tue, 21 Nov 2023 16:05:12 +0100 Subject: Your Hulu plan renews on 01 Dec, Ines Hi Ines, Just a quick reminder — your Hulu subscription will renew on Friday, 01 December 2023. You’re all set, and there’s nothing you need to do if you wish to continue streaming without interruption. Plan: Hulu (No Ads) + Live TV Amount: €69.99 Payment Method: Mastercard ending in •••• 4321 Subscription ID: HULU‑SUB‑20231101‑DE If you want to update your plan or payment method before the renewal, you can do that here: [ ⚙️ Manage Subscription ] Coming soon to Hulu: Whispering Pines – Premieres 08 Dec Live UEFA matches this holiday season A fresh Kids’ Winter Collection Questions about your renewal? Just reply to this email or reach us at billing@hulu.com — we’re here 24/7. Thanks for streaming with us! – The Hulu Billing Team

From: Hulu Billing billing@hulu.com To: ana.rodriguez58@example.es Date: Mon, 04 Dec 2023 13:22:49 +0100 Subject: Your refund has been processed, Ana Hi Ana, We hope you’re having a great day. We wanted to let you know that your requested refund has been processed and the funds are on their way back to you—thank you for giving us the chance to resolve this. Below is a summary of the refund details for your peace of mind: Description: Refund for Hulu (No Ads) Monthly subscription Amount Refunded: €11.99 Original Charge Date: Thursday, 30 November 2023 Refund Processed On: Monday, 04 December 2023 Payment Method: Mastercard ending in •••• 8765 Refund Transaction ID: HULU‑REF‑20231204‑ES Your access to Hulu remains active through the end of the current billing period, so you can still enjoy your favorite content without interruption. Going forward, you won't see another charge for this billing cycle, and your next payment will only occur if you choose to continue or modify your plan. If you have any questions about this refund or your account in general, please feel free to reply to this email or reach out to us at billing@hulu.com. We’re here to help and want to ensure everything is exactly how you expect it. Thanks for being part of the Hulu community, Ana—we value your trust and look forward to continuing to deliver the entertainment you love. Warm regards, The Hulu Billing Team Hulu, LLC 625 Madison Avenue, 22nd Floor • New York, NY 10022 © 2023 Hulu, LLC. All rights reserved.

From: Hulu Support support@hulu.com To: marco.dalessandro81@example.it Date: Fri, 15 Dec 2023 17:42:11 +0100 Subject: Your Hulu subscription has been canceled, Marco Hi Marco, We’re sorry to see you go, but your cancellation request has been processed successfully. Below, you’ll find all the details about your final access period and what to expect moving forward: Plan: Hulu (No Ads) Monthly Cancellation Requested On: Friday, 15 December 2023 Your Access Ends On: Sunday, 14 January 2024 Final Charge Amount: €11.99 (processed 15 Dec 2023) Payment Method: Visa ending in •••• 3456 Subscription ID: HULU‑CANCEL‑20231215‑IT Your account remains active—so you can continue enjoying Hulu through Sunday, 14 January 2024, when your current billing cycle ends. After that, your subscription will stop, and no further charges will be made. We sincerely hope you’ve enjoyed your time with us, whether it was diving into Originals, exploring new arrivals, or catching up on live events. If you ever change your mind, reactivating is easy—just sign in and select Restart Subscription. And if you have feedback—whether about content, pricing, or features—we’d love to hear it. Feel free to reply directly or send us your thoughts at support@hulu.com. Your voice helps us improve. Thanks for being a part of Hulu, Marco. We hope you’ll return someday—and that when you do, you’ll find even more entertainment you love. Best wishes, The Hulu Support Team

From: Hulu Support support@hulu.com To: camille.leblanc47@example.fr Date: Tue, 28 Nov 2023 10:33:58 +0100 Subject: Your Hulu account has been deleted, Camille Hi Camille, We wanted to let you know that your request to delete your Hulu account has been processed successfully. We understand that people’s streaming needs change over time, and we appreciate that you gave us the opportunity to be part of your entertainment journey. Below, you’ll find the details confirming that your account and associated data have been permanently removed from our active systems. Account Deletion Date: Tuesday, 28 November 2023 Email Associated: camille.leblanc47@example.fr Last Billing Cycle Ended: Monday, 27 November 2023 Outstanding Balance: €0.00 Deletion Confirmation ID: HULU‑DEL‑20231128‑FR All personal data tied to your profile—including watch history, saved shows, preferences, and payment information—has been deleted in accordance with our privacy policy. Your feedback and insights were valuable to us, and while we’re sad to see you go, we hope you’ll consider us again in the future. If you’d like to return down the line, reactivating is easy—simply sign up again using the same email. You’ll be welcomed back with new Originals, updated features, and personalized recommendations based on your renewed interests. Meanwhile, if you have any questions or wish to request copies of certain data, feel free to reply or reach out at support@hulu.com—we’re here to help. Thank you for your time with Hulu, Camille. We wish you all the best and hope our paths cross again! Warm regards, The Hulu Support Team
